page.title: 08Denbigh Mayor's Town duties
page.content: Before leaving for the{Town Council meeting I am busy with correspondence and administration in connection with organising the{Flower Show}and concerning{Council}matters. At{7pm}I arrive at the{Council {Offices}and as{Chairman}of the{Council I don the{Gold chain}of Office which comprises{34 inscribed links}_ the first one dated{1836-37.}The meeting considers and fully discusses matters appertaining to the town and a number of decisions are taken. The meeting ends at{8:35}so I leave {Whitehall}to join my wife for an appointment at a local Club. As{Mayor and{Mayoress}we are to judge a{Fancy {Dress}competition to mark{V.E. day. The{Mayoress}presents the prizes and I make a short speech. The celebrations end at{11:15}and we leave for home.
